# minimumSpan

**Interface Property**

The minimum longitudinal and latitudinal span the map displays.

## Declaration

```swift
minimumSpan?: CoordinateSpan;
```

## Discussion

Set this value to ensure that [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Map/showItems] sets a map region no smaller than the minimum span specified.

## Show item options

- **animate**: A Boolean value that determines whether the map animates as the map region changes to show the items.
- **padding**: Spacing that the framework adds around the computed map region when showing items.
- **cameraDistance**: The distance from the center of the map to the camera, when showing the items.
